name: Rude Bandit Buggy
description:
Mine truckers have always been among the most skilled and careful drivers on the roads. They have always transported heavy, unsecured goods across bumpy, hilly tracks,Cars, barrels, crates, and other cargo carefully driven along roads that feature steep climbs, sudden drops, troublesome obstacles, and more.
Ok Trucker, let's put this monster into gear!
Safe delivery?
No!
This time you are on a more difficult and interesting task that is Car Crushing.
Only a top-class trucker can manage this huge monster and handle it trickily to crush the cars.
